mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, AUTH_GROUP_ID, IS_ACTIVE, LANGUAGE, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PASSWORD, MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE, PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE, PERSON_ID, THEME_TYPE, USER_NAME, USER_STATUS, USER_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(DISABLED_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS DISABLED_DATE, EMAIL, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_PORTAL_USER, PHOTO_PATH, PIN, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE, PORTAL_SKIN, PROP_TO_PORTAL, RESET_PASSWORD, RESET_TERM_CONDITION, SECURITY_QUESTION_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_2, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM SYS_USER WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy} FOR UPDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_USER ( USER_ID, AUTH_GROUP_ID, IS_ACTIVE, LANGUAGE, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PASSWORD, MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE, PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE, PERSON_ID, THEME_TYPE, USER_NAME, USER_STATUS, USER_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLED_DATE, EMAIL, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_PORTAL_USER, PHOTO_PATH, PIN, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE, PORTAL_SKIN, PROP_TO_PORTAL, RESET_PASSWORD, RESET_TERM_CONDITION, SECURITY_QUESTION_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_2, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${USER_ID}, ${AUTH_GROUP_ID}, ${IS_ACTIVE}, ${LANGUAGE}, ${LOGIN_ID}, ${LOGIN_PASSWORD}, ${MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE}, ${PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE}, ${PERSON_ID}, ${THEME_TYPE}, ${USER_NAME}, ${USER_STATUS}, ${USER_TYPE}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${DISABLED_DATE}, ${EMAIL}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${IS_PORTAL_USER}, ${PHOTO_PATH}, ${PIN}, ${PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID}, ${PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE}, ${PORTAL_SKIN}, ${PROP_TO_PORTAL}, ${RESET_PASSWORD}, ${RESET_TERM_CONDITION}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_1}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_2}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

INSERT INTO SYS_USER ( USER_ID, AUTH_GROUP_ID, IS_ACTIVE, LANGUAGE, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PASSWORD, MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE, PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE, PERSON_ID, THEME_TYPE, USER_NAME, USER_STATUS, USER_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, DISABLED_DATE, EMAIL, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_PORTAL_USER, PHOTO_PATH, PIN, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE, PORTAL_SKIN, PROP_TO_PORTAL, RESET_PASSWORD, RESET_TERM_CONDITION, SECURITY_QUESTION_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_2, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxRowPerPage,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageNumPerPage,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{themeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disabledDate,jdbcType=TIME}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertDate,jdbcType=TIME}, #{insertUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPortalUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portalOrgProfileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portalSecurityRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portalSkin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propToPortal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resetPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resetTermCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityQuestion1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityQuestion2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityQuestionAnswer1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{securityQuestionAnswer2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIME}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_USER SET AUTH_GROUP_ID = ${AUTH_GROUP_ID}, IS_ACTIVE = ${IS_ACTIVE}, LANGUAGE = ${LANGUAGE}, LOGIN_ID = ${LOGIN_ID}, LOGIN_PASSWORD = ${LOGIN_PASSWORD}, MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE = ${MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE}, PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE = ${PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE}, PERSON_ID = ${PERSON_ID}, THEME_TYPE = ${THEME_TYPE}, USER_NAME = ${USER_NAME}, USER_STATUS = ${USER_STATUS}, USER_TYPE = ${USER_TYPE}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, DISABLED_DATE = ${DISABLED_DATE}, EMAIL = ${EMAIL}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, IS_PORTAL_USER = ${IS_PORTAL_USER}, PHOTO_PATH = ${PHOTO_PATH}, PIN = ${PIN}, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID = ${PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID}, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE = ${PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE}, PORTAL_SKIN = ${PORTAL_SKIN}, PROP_TO_PORTAL = ${PROP_TO_PORTAL}, RESET_PASSWORD = ${RESET_PASSWORD}, RESET_TERM_CONDITION = ${RESET_TERM_CONDITION}, SECURITY_QUESTION_1 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_1}, SECURITY_QUESTION_2 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_2}, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1}, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}

UPDATE SYS_USER SET AUTH_GROUP_ID = #{authGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LANGUAGE = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_ID = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_PASSWORD = #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE = #{maxRowPerPage,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE = #{pageNumPerPage,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PERSON_ID = #{personId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THEME_TYPE = #{themeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_STATUS = #{userStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISABLED_DATE = #{disabledDate,jdbcType=TIME}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSERT_DATE = #{insertDate,jdbcType=TIME}, INSERT_USER_ID = #{insertUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_PORTAL_USER = #{isPortalUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTO_PATH = #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIN = #{pin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID = #{portalOrgProfileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE = #{portalSecurityRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORTAL_SKIN = #{portalSkin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROP_TO_PORTAL = #{propToPortal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESET_PASSWORD = #{resetPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESET_TERM_CONDITION = #{resetTermCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECURITY_QUESTION_1 = #{securityQuestion1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECURITY_QUESTION_2 = #{securityQuestion2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1 = #{securityQuestionAnswer1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2 = #{securityQuestionAnswer2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIME}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1 ${additionalAttributesForUpdateWithDto}
